Package io.clonecloudstore.driver.s3

Class DriverS3Properties

java.lang.Object
io.clonecloudstore.driver.s3.DriverS3Properties
@ApplicationScoped public class DriverS3Properties extends Object
Configurable values for S3

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    CCS_DRIVER_S_3_MAX_PART_SIZE
    MultiPart size (minimum 5 MB, maximum 5 GB, default 256 MB)
    static final String
    CCS_DRIVER_S3_HOST
     
    static final String
    CCS_DRIVER_S3_KEY
     
    static final String
    CCS_DRIVER_S3_KEY_ID
     
    static final String
    CCS_DRIVER_S3_MAX_PART_SIZE_FOR_UNKNOWN_LENGTH
    MultiPart size (minimum 5 MB, maximum ~2 GB): will be used to buffer InputStream if length is unknown, so take care of the Memory consumption associated (512 MB, default, will limit the total InputStream length to 5 TB since 10K parts)
    static final String

      public static final String CCS_DRIVER_S_3_MAX_PART_SIZE

      • Constant Field Values

    • CCS_DRIVER_S3_MAX_PART_SIZE_FOR_UNKNOWN_LENGTH

      public static final String CCS_DRIVER_S3_MAX_PART_SIZE_FOR_UNKNOWN_LENGTH
      MultiPart size (minimum 5 MB, maximum ~2 GB): will be used to buffer InputStream if length is unknown, so take care of the Memory consumption associated (512 MB, default, will limit the total InputStream length to 5 TB since 10K parts)
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
